messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Just a short note
messages.msgSnippet: Lynn, Been there!  I hope you recover to computer sitting soon! many blessings, erin (nine knee operations later) . ... sit ... of
messages.messageBody:
Lynn,

Been there! I hope you recover to computer sitting soon!

many blessings,
erin (nine knee operations later)
.
> I just wanted to let everyone know I am OK, just makes my knee hurts to
sit
> in my computer chair and I will send a longer email soon! Thanks for all
of
> the thoughts and prayers! Lynn F

messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to let everyone know I am OK, just makes my knee hurts to sit
in my computer chair and I will send a longer email soon! Thanks for all of
the thoughts and prayers! Lynn F
